title: Lewis Powell Authors Corporate Blueprint Memo
summary: Supreme Court Justice nominee Lewis F. Powell Jr. writes confidential memo to U.S. Chamber of Commerce outlining systematic strategy for corporate capture of democratic institutions. The memo provides a detailed blueprint for business mobilization through think tanks, legal foundations, lobbying organizations, and media influence. Scholars consider this document a foundational text in understanding how corporations systematically transformed American political and legal infrastructure.
